Detailed Description

HTML list class.

This class is used as a base class for all list elements.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License

Boo_Html_List::htmlDummyLi ( array $  attrs = array()  ) 

Returns a dummy list item.

This is used as a place holder for empty lists so they are valid xhtml.

Returns:
Boo_Html_Li A dummy list item.
Parameters:
array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
